name: Courage (Taldius)
description:
Made during Global Game Jam 2014.

Courage is a game about sadness and fear, and how to overcome it to make it your strength.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move around
  • Mouse - Look around
  • Left Click - Grab objects
  • Right Click - Close eyes R - Retry level

Team:

  • Antoine Semblat - GameDesigner/3D Artist (Twitter / Patreon)
  • Quentin Petitfils - Programmer
  • Pierre Nole - Programmer
  • Marc-Antoine Archier - Sound Designer
